ideas.title: Symmetric exit ratios (-10%/+10%)
ideas.description: Current -8%/+12% asymmetry requires 40% win rate to break even. Test symmetric ratios.
ideas.hypothesis: Symmetric exits will improve risk/reward math and require lower win rate to profit

ideas.title: Wider exits (-15%/+25%)
ideas.description: Test much wider exits to let winners run and losers more room
ideas.hypothesis: Wider exits may catch bigger moves and reduce whipsaw exits

ideas.title: Transformer temporal encoder
ideas.description: Replace TCN with Transformer encoder (already implemented, needs testing)
ideas.hypothesis: Attention mechanism may better capture important price patterns

ideas.title: Shorter max hold (20 min)
ideas.description: Reduce max hold from 45 min to 20 min to match prediction horizon better
ideas.hypothesis: Predictions are for 15 min, holding 45 min causes drift. Shorter hold may align better.

ideas.title: Stricter HMM thresholds (0.75/0.25)
ideas.description: Increase HMM threshold strictness for fewer but higher quality trades
ideas.hypothesis: Current 0.70/0.30 may be letting through marginal signals

ideas.title: Fresh 3-month pretrained model
ideas.description: Train predictor on 3 months of recent data, test on current month (walk-forward)
ideas.hypothesis: Pre-trained model on recent data performed best in previous tests

ideas.title: RMSNorm + GeGLU activations
ideas.description: Use modern transformer components (RMSNorm, GeGLU) from T5/Gemma2
ideas.hypothesis: Modern normalization and gated activations may improve prediction stability

ideas.title: VVIX (volatility of volatility)
ideas.description: Add VVIX as a feature for better regime detection
ideas.hypothesis: VVIX spikes signal regime changes before VIX does
